channel.title: Release Notes - 2019 on Releases - aspose.com
channel.description: Recent content in Release Notes - 2019 on Releases - aspose.com

item.title: Aspose.Email for CPP 19.9 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes information for Aspose.Email for C++ 19.9. Aspose.Email for C++ 19.9 is based on Aspose.Email for .NET 19.9. Major Changes Support for Exchange Web Services (EWS) protocol API Resources The following API resources can be of help to you in getting started with Aspose.Email API. Product Documentation – Provides detailed examples of working with the API API Reference Guide – Details all the namespaces and classes of the API GitHub Examples – Provides ready to run API example Support Forum – Write to us if you have any query or inquiry about the API

item.title: Aspose.Email for CPP 19.3.1 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes information for Aspose.Email for C++ 19.3.1. Aspose.Email for C++ 19.3.1 is based on Aspose.Email for .NET 19.3 and supports both Windows and Linux operating systems. Major Changes Fixed a critical security bug in asposecpplib. API Resources The following API resources can be of help to you in getting started with Aspose.Email API. Product Documentation – Provides detailed examples of working with the API API Reference Guide – Details all the namespaces and classes of the API GitHub Examples – Provides ready to run API example Support Forum – Write to us if you have any query or inquiry about the API

item.title: Aspose.Email for CPP 19.3 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes information for Aspose.Email for C++ 19.3. Aspose.Email for C++ 19.3 is based on Aspose.Email for .NET 19.3. The functionality of the API is the same as for initial version i.e Aspose.Email for C++ 19.2. Major Changes Support for Google (Gmail) protocol API Resources The following API resources can be of help to you in getting started with Aspose.Email API. Product Documentation – Provides detailed examples of working with the API API Reference Guide – Details all the namespaces and classes of the API GitHub Examples – Provides ready to run API example Support Forum – Write to us if you have any query or inquiry about the API

item.title: Aspose.Email for CPP 19.2 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes information for Aspose.Email for C++ 19.2. Aspose.Email for C++ 19.2 is based on Aspose.Email for .NET 19.2. The functionality of the API is the same as for initial version i.e Aspose.Email for C++ 19.1. API Resources The following API resources can be of help to you in getting started with Aspose.Email API. Product Documentation – Provides detailed examples of working with the API API Reference Guide – Details all the namespaces and classes of the API GitHub Examples – Provides ready to run API example Support Forum – Write to us if you have any query or inquiry about the API

item.title: Aspose.Email for CPP 19.1 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes information for Aspose.Email for C++ 19.1. Aspose.Email for C++ 19.1 is based on Aspose.Email for .NET 19.1. The functionality of the API is same as for initial version i.e Aspose.Email for C++ 18.11. Major Changes Support for OLM format (outlook for MAC) API Resources The following API resources can be of help to you in getting started with Aspose.Email API. Product Documentation – Provides detailed examples of working with the API API Reference Guide – Details all the namespaces and classes of the API GitHub Examples – Provides ready to run API example Support Forum – Write to us if you have any query or inquiry about the API
